Path Pattern Matching (using regex)

Path segment 1: {{request.pathSegments.[1]}}

Path segment 2: {{request.pathSegments.[2]}}

It is possible to use regex pattern matching on the url path and then use the templating engine to extract various data items from the path/request and populate the response with that data.

For more info on request mapping, see the docs at Wiremock documentation, request matching
